guide: Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
You can also kill Enderman for this to
also contribute to the Enderman Slayer goal.
Kill Endermen in The End using full Ender Armor
and a Void Sword or Dreadlord Sword.
Recommended for this is to fish in the
Backwater Bayou with the best rod you have
access to and full Angler Set or better.
You can also donate any special fish that you
get to Coral in Galatea (requires 1.21)
For this you can participate in Arachne fights
in the Spiders Den, salvage Arachne/Spider Gear
or collect secrets in dungeons.
To progress in this you can:
- Participate in Dragon Fights
- Salvage Ender Pieces at the Draconic Altar
- Kill Lost Adventurers
- Collect secrets in dungeons
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
Talk to Guildford in the Dungeon Hub
and complete 4/4 objectives for any race.
Don't forget to talk to Guildford
after each run you do.

note: Obtain a Bronze or higher medal from Jacobs Contest
guide: Do contests like Wheat, Potato or Carrot.
You can also try to utilize pests to help here.
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
Use NPC shops to buy materials for easy crafts.
Claim your cake buff (visit skyerzz, nightlibra or prtl),
hold an angler 4+ rod and visit someone with a
Sea Creature Chance beacon (visit ReyMaratov).
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils or the Wiki.
You will need Ender Pearls to reach some of them.

note: Kill a t2 Slayer Boss under 80s
guide: Recommended for this either Revenant Horror II
or Tarantula Broodfather II. Use your Ender Armor
and Void Sword (200k) for this.
You can buy and equip the Angler Equipment
bought from the Fish Merchant in the Hub
for 400 coins. This will also help
with the Sea Summoner goal.
Go to The End to mine Ender Nodes and
kill Nest Mites for Enchanted End Stone.
You need to be Combat Level 12 to go there.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you
talked to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
You will get the Rock Pet by mining 20k
Ore Blocks. Keep in mind that Stone doesn't
count for this. Don't forget to equip the pet ;)
You can also upgrade a lower rarity with Kat,
§cbut keep in mind that this will take up to
§c3 irl days.
Talk to Jamie in the Hub and
claim the Rogue Sword from him.
Right click it to gain +100 Speed,
or just wait for a splash.
Depending on your Bingo Rank, Alixers
Splash might also be enough for this.
Complete a Floor 1 with a score of 230+
and buy the chest afterwards. If you can't buy
it on the spot, either save money and buy it
from Croesus within the next 2 days or do another run.
You will probably need help with this.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
Hunting also counts for this.
Do your daily Experimentation Tables
after getting Enchanting Level 10.

note: Obtain a Mediocre Ring of Love
guide: Follow the Romero Questline until you
get this. You will only need
1 Yellow Rock, 15 poppies and 64 Emerald.
This unlocks at 1k Mushroom Collection.
You can get that by farming the Mushrooms
in the Mushroom Desert.
Obtain the needed Glowstone by buying a
Glowstone Block from the Builder and breaking
it on your island.

note: Gain 5 Strength from a Training Weight
guide: For this you'll want to grab a Training Weight
from a secret in dungeons and keep it in your
inventory till it shows a Strength bonus of +5.
Drop it once it reached that point.
For this you'll want to buy all 6 Talismans
from the Adventurer in The Hub (26k)
and grab the Cat Talisman for the Cat goal.
Recommended for this are:
Bingo, Rock, Grandma Wolf,
Pig, Enderman, Horse, Jerry,
Chicken, Silverfish, Bee,
Owl (2.2m coins) and Tarantula
Some of them require certain
collections and materials to craft.
